opSeq.description: Monotonic operation sequence within a transaction.

affectedKeys.description: Optional stable row keys affected by this patch (for row-scoped filtering).

affectedIndices.description: Optional best-effort list indices affected by this patch (unstable across reorder).

from.description: Optional previous value (full diagnostics). Must be JSON-serializable; omit when not serializable.

to.description: Optional next value (full diagnostics). Must be JSON-serializable; omit when not serializable.
